chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
si
perfecto! ahora mismo me encuentro en el punto de partida
veo una ramita a mi izquierda que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿por dónde empiezo?
empiezas donde esta la mariposa
guay! para llegar a la mariposa, creo que necesito ir hacia el sureste desde el tigre, ¿verdad?
si
vale, ya estoy en la isla de la mariposa
¿sigo recto o giro ahora?

sigues derecho y despues vas a tomar una izquierda para la isla de loro y elefante. cuando llegues ahi vas a tomar otra izquierda sobre las rocas para lleguar a la isla de ranas. cuando llegues ahi vas a tomar una derecha y te vas por las aguas de cocodrilos para lleguar a la isla de girafa. ultimamente, vas a tomar una izquierda y pasas a la isla de culebras que tiene el tesoro.
¡ok, voy en ello! Veo al loro en el árbol. ahora estoy tomando a la izquierda por las 3 rocas hasta la isla de la rana
luego veo al cocodrilo y giro a la derecha. ¡Veo al elefante y al lado del elefante, la girafa! ¿sigo hasta la isla de la culebra, no?
si
fantástico, ya estoy en la isla de la culebra. veo el tesoro 2 pasos al este desde aquí
moviendo ahora. ¡y bingo! ¡llegué al tesoro! *terminado*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
yes i am
great! start by heading directly to your left, just place yourself under that wooden bench. now, aim for that florist stand across the trail. but wait, don't reach it just yet
you're gonna pull a sharp left u-turn and cross back over the trail. pup's waiting, head back towards the white dog. simple, right?
im here with the dog
awesome! now we will change the direction a bit. now, go south
keep on moving until you see another white dog chilling next to a red and white checkered picnic mat. you see it?
yes
sweet! now, just hop over that mat, don't forget to touch that bowl of berries on your way, and then make your way westwards
im here
fantastic! now you're going to see another wooden branch that crosses a river
remember how to cross a branch? just do it again and head to the north this time
okay
perfect! avoid that green bush, we're not touching it
circle it from the right side. you see the florist stand again? head towards it
yes
great! now just zag a quick left and duck under the stand
you'll see a big bridge ahead with people cycling on it. head towards that direction!
okay
amazing! keep on moving after the bridge till you see two nice elderly folks sitting on a bench reading newspapers
got it?
i did
super cool! now go a wee southward between the elderly folks and another wooden branch you’ll see there
keep going and you'll see a familiar friend, the green bush right next to the end of the branch. spot it?
yes
good job! now, you'll want to go east between the branch and the bush
take a few more steps
ive done it
brilliant! see something brown and cute now? you might want to check if it has antlers!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?

you will start in the open blue tint. you will head south and see a cute whiteish brown dog. once you pass it you will head left on the trail. you will go in between the dog and the campfire and make your way between the fire and the mushrooms. you will walk towards the blue car and make a quick u-turn at this trail and go through the first left. keep heading down south where you will come across a telescope. ahead of the telescope there is a curved trail. instead of taking that trail you will cut in between the telescope and the tree on the corner of the curve. once you pass the telescope you will continue heading west past the rocks and get to the wooden house.
gotcha! starting at the blue tent, heading south, passing the pupper, squeezing through dog and fire. jogging between the fire and the shrooms towards the blue car, u-turn, then south again
sidestepping the telescope, sliding past some rocks, then - hello, wooden house! seems like we've made it. finished! is that right, bud?
perfect!
nice! i always knew we made a killer team, buddy
let's ace the next one too!
oh yeah
awesome, can't wait! bring it on, pal!
so what now?
fancy another round or something else in mind? whatever you like, mate!
did you get to the destination?
yup! arrived at the wooden house safe and sound
we're done! *finished*

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hey there. can you give me all the insructions?
sure thing! but it's more fun if we do it step by step. trust me
so, first off, there's a palm tree to your south-west. start walking towards it
im here
awesome! now turn right and head towards the second palm tree
don't go past it, just turn a sharp left before you reach the third tree and start going south
there
nice! now, you're going to want to veer a bit to the left, heading towards a brown puppy
but before you reach it, take a right turn
done
alright, pal! approaching a big rock and a small one, eh? go right between 'em towards the water
im here by the crab
you've got it! now, time to make some waves
head right, skirting the water alongside the big rock and keep going towards the west
ive come across a shark
woah, cool! but let's keep safe and turn a sharp right here, buddy
ive found a volley ball
epic! now, squirm your way between that ball and the medium rock, going up north
im at a speaker and a tent
aces! now slide a tad left and push towards the north-west, gliding between the red tent and the speaker
im here
heck yeah! now, we're going to circle the tent, like a little dance
give it some flair! then, head south towards the sea
done
great! we're almost there
when you hit the shoreline, take a right and you'll spy a red kayak. follow the path under it
